name: fullstackopen-2022-backend-lesson-code
description: This is a repo for a backend for the Open University Course "Full Stack Open" https://fullstackopen.com/en. It is an addition to my other repo for this course: https://github.com/AndiSwiss/fullstackopen-2022.

scripts.build:frontend-part3: rm -rf build && cd ../fullstackopen-2022/part3/lesson-code-frontend/ && npm run build && cd ../../../fullstackopen-2022-backend-lesson-code && cp -r ../fullstackopen-2022/part3/lesson-code-frontend/build ./
scripts.deploy: npm run set-heroku-git && git push heroku HEAD:main
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:frontend-part3 && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && npm run deploy
